inclusion.criterion: Body weight ≥ 30kg (patients 12-15 years of age) and ≥ 40kg (patients over 16 years of age)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Either one epileptic seizure with high risk of relapse or a newly diagnosed epilepsy with at least 1 seizure within the past 3 months before begin of trial participance
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Fertile women of ≥ 16 years of age must use at least one of the following contraceptives for at least one month prior to initiation of trial participance: Oral contraceptive, contraceptive diaphragm, intrauterine contraceptive device (coil), tube ligation
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Informed consent by the proband in written form after being informed about character, relevance and consequences of the clinical trial
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with non-epileptic seizures or acute symptomatic seizures whose cause can be corrected
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who suffer from absence seizures or simple partial seizures without motor signs (aura) only
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who had a chronic focal epilepsy or an epileptic state in their medical history

exclusion.criterion: Patients with progressive neurological, degenerative or malignant diseases which are clinically relevant from the investigator's point of view (e.g. cardiovascular or endocrinic diseases)
